name: Party Wright: Party Planner
description:
A casual game  made for eJAM 2020 hosted by IGDA. The theme of the jam was CELEBRATION.

Number of team members (excluding mentor): 5

It was our 1st 48 hour game jam. Learned a lot of new things doing a jam of this kind. So,Our wonderful members are:

Programmer
1)Brian- whynotandwhy@gmail.com

2)Luaden-acederrickyoung@gmail.com

Audio

1)Justino Eustacio Pérez - jep44@humboldt.edu

Artist
1)Fuse Breaker - fusebreaker30@yahoo.com

Technical Artist

1)Moinuddin Ahmed- ahme0244@algonquinlive.com/jony100200@hotmail.com

Mentor
1)Dean Takahasi

NOTE: Since it was our first 48 hour game jam with new people we had to make what we could. Hence, pardon the bugs. Please download the Zip file to get full screen. We tried our best to meet the deadline.
